Details: Created guides and checklists for verification staff. Included screenshots and troubleshooting tips.
Organizing sessions for new and existing staff. Using both in-person and online formats.
Deliver hands-on training on verification workflow and tools. Include practice with real laptops.
Evaluate staff understanding and readiness with short quizzes or supervised sessions.
Offer support and refresher training as needed. Set up a chat group for quick questions.
Gather feedback from staff after training to improve materials and process.
